mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.imp_id AS "impId", a.p_number AS "pNumber", a.p_name AS "pName", a.leader_name AS "leaderName", a.no AS "no", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.teachers AS "teachers", a.modify AS "modify", a.pro_category AS "proCategory", a.level AS "level", a.result AS "result", a.stage_result AS "stageResult", a.reimbursement_amount AS "reimbursementAmount", a.pro_model_md_id AS "proModelMdId", a.gnodeid AS "gnodeid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pro_md_mid_error a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM pro_md_mid_error a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_md_mid_error( id, imp_id, p_number, p_name, leader_name, no, mobile, teachers, modify, pro_category, level, result, stage_result, reimbursement_amount, pro_model_md_id, gnodeid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{impId}, #{pNumber}, #{pName}, #{leaderName}, #{no}, #{mobile}, #{teachers}, #{modify}, #{proCategory}, #{level}, #{result}, #{stageResult}, #{reimbursementAmount}, #{proModelMdId}, #{gnodeid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_md_mid_error SET imp_id = #{impId}, p_number = #{pNumber}, p_name = #{pName}, leader_name = #{leaderName}, no = #{no}, mobile = #{mobile}, teachers = #{teachers}, modify = #{modify}, pro_category = #{proCategory}, level = #{level}, result = #{result}, stage_result = #{stageResult}, reimbursement_amount = #{reimbursementAmount}, pro_model_md_id = #{proModelMdId}, gnodeid = #{gnodeid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM pro_md_mid_error t WHERE t.imp_id = #{impid} order by t.create_date
